title: Cisco eyes a collaborative security solution
text:
Home / Cisco eyes a collaborative security solution Cisco eyes a collaborative security solution Oct 21, 2015 Stuart Hatto, EMEA field product manager at Cisco Security. 
Cisco is demonstrating how the network can be used as a security monitoring system to provide visibility into the network and everything that connected to it. 
The company is showcasing its wider, threat centric security portfolio designed to support organisations before, during and after and attack. “We want to use the network to provide visibility of all the threats to be ahead of them and face them,” Stuart Hatto, EMEA field product manager at Cisco Security, says. 
‘Network as a sensor and enforcer’ is the idea that the company wants to promote during GITEX TECHNOLOGY WEEK 2015 in terms of security. “The event is a trend setter, a lot of organisations from Europe comet to showcase here. We have seen bigger stands and more presence in the last few years. All the vendors are taking the region as an opportunity and it is important to catch the wave at an early stage. As far as Cisco is concern, we are trying to promote the message that it is time to provide a collaborative solution and be the leader in security solutions,” Hatto explains. 
He highlights that all verticals are interested in security but in the Middle East, specifically, the financial and the energy sector are the main ones. Related Stories
